headline: Why Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of power management chips maker Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) fell 11.7% in the afternoon session after the company reported third quarter earnings which failed to impress Wall Street.

headline: Monolithic Power Surpasses Q3 Earnings Estimates on Record Revenues
summary: MPWR posts record Q3 revenues and beats earnings estimates, driven by strength across Automotive, Storage and Computing, and Industrial markets.

headline: MPWR Q3 Deep Dive: Broad-Based Growth, Margin Stability, and Solution Expansion
summary: Power management chips maker Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 18.9% year on year to $737.2 million. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was optimistic at $740 million at the midpoint, 2% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.73 per share was 2.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
